title: Ashai nirai
sahitya:
Ashai nirai vEriDavE aruL puriya vENumaiyE ArumukhanE unniDam kOrip-pera yAnurum


anupallavi

  kAsu paNam tEDi aDaiya kAsiniyil ODiDAdu mAsu paDiyA un mahimai pEshi yAcikkum en


caraNam    viNNattanai eTTit-toTTu viDumaLavukku Ashaip-paTTu eNNiyadu kiTTAda Ekkamenai vATTAdu
aNDam anaittum eTTum aLavilAp-pugazh vIsum aNNalE unnaip-pUjai paNNi magizh dAsanAgum
